response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory offer for you. We are extending a generous opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your industry. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 1200000}
